10:00 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
10:16 <vmassol> good morning everyone  
10:16 <vmassol> so today is our last day before 7.3M2 release  
10:16 <vmassol> we need to check CI and stabilize  
10:17 <vmassol> RM is thomas but he's on holidays ATM so we need to have something ready for him for Monday ideally :)  
10:17 <vmassol> we also need to stabilize the 6.x and 7.x branches on CI since I believe we need to also release bug fix versions

12:06 <ClemensR> when I view the "Scripting Documentation Application" in a 7.2 (jetty/hsql) install,  it breaks all {{html}} macros. Had anyone else tried that?  (likely it is just me ... but I wanted to ask anyway)

13:37 <ekarlso> has joined #xwiki  
13:37 <ekarlso> hoii there  
13:45 <Enygma`> hi  
13:47 <ekarlso> is xwiki translated to norwegian ? :D  
14:06 <evalica1> ekarlso: http://l10n.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/L10N/StatusByLanguage?language=no - you need to register and have an user to see the statistics  
14:06 <evalica1> there are 6402 translations done for NO  
14:07 <evalica1> and 4857 empty. So it'd say it's partially translated - according to these graphs  
14:07 <evalica1> but you could help translating it - if you have the time  
14:08 <evalica1> is now known as <evalica>  
14:08 <ekarlso> ok : )  
14:10 <evalica> actually that is the total number of translations, so the percentage is lower.
